shortdesc.ph: Audio and video stream recording configuration.
Configuration for audio and video stream recording.

Configuration for audio and video stream recording.

pd.note: Make sure the specified path exists and is writable.
pd.ph: Absolute path to save the recorded file locally, including file name and format. For example:

plentry.pd: Format of the recorded file. See .
Content to be recorded. See .
Maximum recording duration in milliseconds. Default is 120000.
Interval for updating recording information, in milliseconds. Range: [1000,10000]. The SDK triggers the callback based on this value to report updated recording information.
Width (px) of the recorded video. The maximum value of width × height should not exceed 3840 × 2160. This parameter is required only when calling and setting type in to Preview.
Height (px) of the recorded video. The maximum value of width × height should not exceed 3840 × 2160. This parameter is required only when calling and setting type in to Preview.
Frame rate of the recorded video. Maximum value is 30, e.g., 5, 10, 15, 24, 30. This parameter is required only when calling and setting type in to Preview.
Sampling rate (Hz) of the recorded audio. Can be set to 16000, 32000, 44100, or 48000. This parameter is required only when calling and setting type in to Preview.

Number of audio channels:
1: Mono
2: Stereo This parameter is required only when calling and setting type in to Preview.
Type of the video source for recording. See . This parameter is required only when calling and setting type in to Preview.
